altTitles.ja: ガールズ×ヴァンパイア

altTitles.en: Girls x Vampire

description.en: **Alt Official Raw:** [note](https://note.com/girls_vampire)

title.en: Magabanashi: Ghost Stories Spreading on Social Media

altTitles.ja: 禍話: SNSで伝播する令和怪談

altTitles.ja-ro: Magabanashi: SNS de Denpa suru Reiwa Kaidan

description.en: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.

title.en: Watashi Dake ga Miyaji Miyuki wo Aishiteiru

altTitles.ja: 私だけが宮地美雪を愛している

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi Dake ga Miyaji Miyuki wo Aishiteiru

altTitles.en: I'm the Only One for Miyaji Miyuki

description.en:
Miyaji Miyuki (16) moved away when she was little, not long after going on a spree of proposing to several different girls in kindergarten.

Years later, she returns to her hometown and transfers to a new high school, where she is forced to reckon with her past...

altTitles.en: Becoming the Queen at the Age of Six

description.en: I woke up to find myself transmigrated into a novel as the “background character that's doomed to die.” Now stuck in the body of a six-year-old, I’ve got some serious challenges ahead of me. But I’m not about to let fate have its way. Even if I have to become the villain, I’ll do whatever it takes to survive!

altTitles.en: Mortal of The Doom

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

description.en:
Life dealt her the shittiest hand, yet Erika won't lose her heart! Using all she has from body, charm, and brain, she welcomes all the challenges ahead and turns it into a game.
Follow her whimsical adventure towards the city's underworld!

altTitles.ja: オカワリいただけただろうか?

title.en: Magokoro Scramble! What Lies in Your Heart?

altTitles.ja: 真心スクランブル！

altTitles.vi: Magokoro Scramble! Điều ẩn giấu trong trái tim bạn là gì?

description.en: Is this love natural instinct or fate? Koharu is born to a bloodline who can read people's minds. Although he told himself he would never open up to anyone besides his family, those plans are thrown off when he meets an eccentric girl by the name of Yuki. With their encounter, Koharu begins to fall deeper and deeper... into the pit of romance!
description.ja: 心の声が聞こえてしまう“聞心の血筋”である真田心春。未来永劫、家族以外には心を開かない予定だったのに、夜蔦瀬雪姫と出会った事で運命が変わり始め…!? この恋は本能？それとも運命――!?
description.vi: Liệu tình yêu này là bản năng tự nhiên hay là định mệnh? Koharu sinh ra trong một dòng dõi có khả năng đọc được suy nghĩ của người khác. Dù đã tự hứa sẽ không mở lòng với ai ngoài gia đình mình, kế hoạch đó bị phá vỡ khi cậu gặp một cô gái kỳ lạ tên Yuki. Cuộc gặp gỡ này đã khiến Koharu ngày càng rơi sâu vào... hố sâu của tình yêu!

title.en: Maigo no Onnanoko o Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.ja: 迷子の女の子を家まで届けたら、玄関から出て来たのは学年一の美少女でした

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo no Onnanoko wo Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.en: When I Brought a Lost Girl Home, the Most Beautiful Girl in My Grade Came Out the Front Door
She Is the Beautiful Girl in the School Year

altTitles.vi: Đưa bé gái bị lạc trở về, người mở cửa là hoa khôi của khối

description.en:
One day, Kuroda Yusei, an introverted high school student with zero dating experience, returns a lost little girl to her house... when the most beautiful girl in his grade, Shirakawa Ayano, appears! 

"As thanks for saving my sister," she begins to approach him boldly for some reason, and every day is filled with mishaps!? On top of that, a busty otaku classmate and an attention-seeking junior girl also appear, and his daily life suddenly becomes more glamorous!? 

A school romance comedy where fate changes as you suddenly become close to "the girl of your dreams"!
description.ja:
恋愛経験ゼロの陰キャ高校生・黒田雄星がある日、迷子になっていた幼女を家まで届けると… 学年一の美少女・白河綾乃が出現!!

「妹を助けてくれたお礼に」と、なぜか彼女が大胆に迫ってくるようになり、毎日がハプニング状態!?
更に巨乳オタク同級生や、かまってちゃんな後輩女子も登場し、一気に華やかな日常に――!?

“憧れのあの子”と急接近して、運命が変わる学園ラブコメ！

altTitles.en: She is Exactly My Type

altTitles.th: แปลงโฉมเธอจนเจอรัก

description.en: After tomboy Haedam is thoroughly friend zoned by her first love, she's determined to glow up before college. But when she makes the wrong impression on her first day of school, she realizes she needs the help of her reluctant neighbor. In exchange, she promises to put up with their living circumstances and keep his secret. What could possibly go wrong?

altTitles.ja: ガチ恋魔王様

description.en: A hero undertakes the task of defeating the Demon Lord for the sake of world peace. When he arrives at the Demon Lord's castle, he is greeted by the Demon Lord with a marriage certificate in her hand! The hero is bewildered by the Demon Lord's strong appeal to marry him, but...? A love comedy about a die-hard-fan Demon Lord and an overly prickly hero whose world is in danger of extinction!
description.pt-br: Um herói assume a tarefa de derrotar o Rei Demônio pelo bem da paz mundial. Quando ele chega ao castelo da Maou, ele é saudado pela Maou com uma certidão de casamento na mão! O herói fica perplexo com o forte apelo da Maou para se casar com ele, mas…? Uma comédia de amor sobre uma Maou amorosa e um herói amargurado cujo mundo está em perigo de extinção!

title.en: Kaji Daikou no Arubaito wo Hajimetara Gakuen Ichi no Bishoujo no Kazoku ni Kiniirarechaimashita

altTitles.ja: 家事代行のアルバイトを始めたら学園一の美少女の家族に気に入られちゃいました。

altTitles.en: I Started Working a Housekeeping Job and Ended up Being Liked by the Family of the Most Beautiful Girl in School

altTitles.pt-br: Comecei a trabalhar como empregado doméstico e acabei sendo apreciado pela família da garota mais bonita da escola

description.en:
My Part-Time Job is at the House of the Cutest Girl in School. A Shy and Awkward Housekeeping Rom-Com with the School Idol!

During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house.

From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school. This charming and awkward housekeeping rom-com featuring the most innocent and beautiful girl in school and a secretly high-spec guy begins!
description.id:
Pekerjaan Paruh Waktuku Ada di Rumah Gadis Termanis di Sekolah. Komedi Romantis Pemalu dan Canggung dengan Sang Idola Sekolah!
Selama tahun kedua sekolah menengahnya, Haruto Otsuki memulai pekerjaan paruh waktu sebagai pembantu rumah tangga selama liburan musim panas. Klien pertamanya ternyata tidak lain adalah Ayaka Tojo, gadis tercantik di sekolah! Meskipun bingung dengan kejadian tak terduga ini, Haruto terus melakukan tugas-tugas pembantu rumah tangganya. Seiring berjalannya waktu, ia menjadi disukai oleh keluarga Ayaka dan mulai mengunjungi rumahnya secara rutin.
Dari membuat makanan rumahan yang menyenangkan Ayaka, hingga pergi berbelanja kebutuhan sehari-hari bersama seperti pasangan pengantin baru, dan bahkan pergi menonton film malu-malu seperti sepasang kekasih muda, mereka mulai semakin dekat dengan menghabiskan momen-momen spesial ini di luar sekolah. Komedi romantis yang menawan dan canggung ini menampilkan gadis paling polos dan cantik di sekolah dan seorang pria yang diam-diam berkelas tinggi!
description.ja: 幼い頃に両親を亡くし、現在は祖母とふたりで暮らしている高校２年生・大槻晴翔は、自身の家事スキルを活かして夏休みに「家事代行サービス」の短期バイトを始める。しかしバイト初日に訪れた派遣先（豪邸）は偶然にも、学園一の美少女と名高い東條綾香の家だった。家事代行をする側とされる側、学校ではまったく交流のなかった二人が、不思議な関係で急接近ーー？
description.pt-br: Meu trabalho de meio período é na casa da garota mais fofa da escola. Uma comédia romântica tímida e estranha com a ídola da escola! Durante seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Haruto Otsuki começa um emprego de meio período como faxineiro durante as férias de verão. Seu primeiro cliente é ninguém menos que Ayaka Tojo, a garota mais linda da escola! Apesar de estar perplexo com esta reviravolta inesperada, Haruto continua fazendo suas tarefas domésticas. Com o tempo, ele se torna querido pela família de Ayaka e começa a visitar regularmente a casa dela. Desde preparar refeições caseiras que encantam Ayaka, até fazer compras juntos como um casal recém-casado, e até ir ao cinema tímidos como jovens amantes, eles começam a se aproximar passando esses momentos especiais fora da escola. Esta comédia romântica charmosa e desajeitada sobre tarefas domésticas, apresentando a garota mais inocente e bonita da escola e um cara secretamente de alta especificação, começa!

altTitles.en: The Legendary Return

description.en:
Due to the situation like the second IMF, the security company Jang Taesan worked for goes bankrupt, and he becomes an unemployed man wandering around Noryangjin-dong. He loses his life saving an elementary school student who was almost hit by a car. But thanks to his good deed, he goes 14 years back in time and is welcomed to a new life.

However the joy of being revived is short-lived. The thought of having to take the college entrance exam again makes me dizzy... But I remember all of the CSAT problems that I encountered while studying and the stock market graph I saw while working as a stockbroker...?! The last life was ruined, but the this next life will become a success!
description.pt-br: Devido a uma certa situação com FMI(Fundo Monetário internacional), a empresa de segurança para a qual Jang Taesan trabalhava vai à falência e ele se torna um homem desempregado vagando por Noryangjin-dong. Ele perde a vida salvando um estudante do ensino fundamental que quase foi atropelado. Mas, graças à sua boa ação, ele volta 14 anos no tempo e é bem-vindo a uma nova vida. No entanto, a alegria de ser revivido dura pouco. A ideia de ter de fazer o vestibular de novo me deixa tonto... Mas como eu me lembro de todos os problemas do CSAT que encontrei enquanto estudava e do gráfico do mercado de ações que vi enquanto trabalhava como corretor da bolsa...?! A última vida foi arruinada, mas a próxima vida vai ser um sucesso!

description.en: Army veteran's last go at the obstacle course turns lethal after a simple fall. A goddess presents an opportunity at new life as a hero! The protagonist ain't having any of it, he was supposed to retire and become a civilian. The arrogant Goddess drops him down to survive while having her own evil schemes. How will his new life progress after encountering another Goddess, a spy and his past life's junior?

altTitles.en: Records of the Demonic Path’s Return

description.en: In an effort to escape the power struggle within the Heavenly Demon Sect, the protagonist Myeong-un retreats to a life of seclusion. However, simply avoiding ambition for the throne is not enough to avert tragedy. Myeong-un flees from the sect leader Myeong-gak, who seeks fratricide, before meeting his demise. At the moment of his death, as his consciousness fades, he hears a voice. "Do you regret it? Do you wish to fight again?"" To his surprise, Myeong-un, believed to be dead, opens his eyes once more....

title.en: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kiyoubinbou ~Party Jijou de Fuyojitsushi wo Yatteita Kenshi, Bannou e to Itaru~

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティを追い出された器用貧乏　～パーティ事情で付与術士をやっていた剣士、万能へと至る～

altTitles.en: The Jack-of-All-Trades Kicked Out of the Hero's Party: The Swordsman Who Became a Support Mage Due to Party Circumstances, Becomes All-Powerful

altTitles.zh-hk: 泛而不精的我被逐出了勇者隊伍

description.en: Being a "Jack-of-all-trades" is a sin!? Despite trying his hardest, he's been told that he's out of a job!! A member of the Hero's party, Orun, is suddenly told by the party leader; "You're insufficient, you need to leave." Additionally, Orun is mocked by his former comrades as a "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None". True, he is well-rounded with no particular skill standing out. Still, he would complete every task with a skillful hand, what's more, he always performed at peak performance...! Orun, having grown frustrated, began working solo. However, deep within his heart lay the drive to become the ultimate "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None", an "All-Rounder"!
description.ja:
「器用貧乏」は罪なのか！？
ソツなくガンバってきたのに戦力外通告！！

勇者パーティに所属しているオルンは、ある日突然
パーティリーダーから告げられる。

「実力不足だからパーティを抜けろ」

と。

さらに、他の仲間からは「器用貧乏」と罵られるオルン。
確かに、全てが平均的で突出した能力はない。
だが、ソツなく器用にこなしていたし、何より皆には
一番尽くしていたはずなのに…！？

失意のオルンは、ソロでの活動を開始する。
しかしその胸には、究極の「器用貧乏」ーー “万能者”になる野心が秘められていた。

title.en: Itazura na Kimi ni Mask-goshi demo Koi wo Uchinukareta

altTitles.ja-ro: Itazurana Kimi ni Masuku-goshi Demo Koi O Uchinukareta

altTitles.ja: いたずらな君にマスク越しでも恋を撃ち抜かれた

description.en:
“Did you just fall in love with me?”

A mischievous, teasing, but innocent girl in an agonizingly sweet adolescent love comedy, hidden behind a mask.

altTitles.ja: タダでは抱かれません

altTitles.en: I Won't Sleep with You for Free

altTitles.id: Aku Gak Nidurin Kamu Secara Cuma-cuma

altTitles.th: ชีวิตพลิกผัน ฉันขายตัวให้เพื่อน

description.en: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex♡.
description.id: Kirishima Miyako, mahasiswa di sebuah universitas khusus wanita dan calon guru, adalah seorang gadis miskin yang menjalani hidup serba hemat. Suatu hari, setelah ditraktir oleh teman gadisnya Nakano Yui, dia diajak untuk mengunjungi ke love hotel. Namun, dia menolaknya karena enggan untuk berhubungan seks dengan temannya. Sampai kemudian, Yui menawarkannya 30.000 yen jika Miyako menerima ajakannya. Sejak saat itu, Miyako melakukan lebih banyak "transaksi" dengan teman-temannya yang lain dari universitasnya!? Kisahpun Yuri tentang persahabatan, uang dan seks pun dimulai.
description.th: คิริชิมะ มิยาโกะ สาวมหาลัยยาจกที่ใฝ่ฝันอยากเป็นครู ได้จับพลัดจับผลูไปเข้าโรงแรมม่านรูดกับเพื่อนซี้นามว่า นากาโนะ ยุย โดยเธอขอมีเซ็กส์ด้วยโดยแลกกับเงิน 30000 เยน! แบบนี้มีหรือมิยาโกะจะไม่เอา!

altTitles.ja: ユーレイ窓

altTitles.en: Ghost Window

description.en:
Danger - Do Not Touch!

From horror to silly gags, and even human drama! A rare collection of works by the unique talent, Ranjyo Miyake, showcasing her distinctive style!

This collection includes the title story, "Ghost Window," with a shocking ending that will send chills down your spine, along with "47C6," "Gonbe-san," "Run Away," "Rebellion 'Ramen Theory,'" "Mint Detective," and "Let’s Hold Hands."

title.en: Real World Mobile: Another World War

altTitles.en: Real World: Another World War

title.en: Kirby of the Stars! Raging Pupupu Hour!

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoshi no Kirby! Mouretsu Pupupu Hour!

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ！ もーれつプププアワー！

description.en: The popular Kirby has been adapted into a new manga to commemorate the completion of the DS game *Kirby: Squeak Squad*! The Squeak Squad, the great bandits, have appeared in the peaceful land of Pupupu Land! However, they are constantly pushed around by Kirby's appetite and copying ability...

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.ja: ブラックチャンネル

description.en:
A dark comedy for the modern era, from CoroCoro Comic!

Enter Black, the "Demonic Yo-Tuber"! With his sidekick Camera-chan, and the aspiring 5th grade Yo-Tuber Satoshi, he makes all kinds of crazy videos using his demonic powers. Filming the "true natures" of anyone from top honor students, to class idols, to supernatural monsters, he makes crazy videos with his demonic powers! What will Black film next...?
description.ja:
今もっとも勢いがあるのは動画クリエイター！
悪魔であるブラックが作る動画は超鬼ヤバ！
クラスのアイドルやエリート小学生の裏を暴いたり、やりたい放題！
ちょっと怖いけど目が離せない、令和の新ダークヒーローここに爆誕！

altTitles.ja: セイレーンは君に歌わない

description.en:
Kanoha Takanashi is a descendent of Sirens and is infatuated with her classmate, Kei Shibuya.
Torn between her feelings and the Siren's unique nature of yearning to eat the one they love, Kanoha musters up the courage to confess to him—only to get completely rejected on the spot!
But what happens when she finds out Shibuya-kun's secret…?

(Source: MANGA Plus)

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.en: Delinquent High School Girl Kuzuhana-chan
Yankee High School Girl Kuzuhana-chan

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio Kuzuhana-chan

description.en: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr: Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359! Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix. Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja: 男女比率1対359!! 359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!! つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!! コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!! 四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br: Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?! Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

altTitles.en: Case Closed

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

altTitles.ja: 名探偵コナン

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

title.en: Maou Reijou no Kyouiku Gakari ~Yuusha Gakuin o Tsuihou Sareta Heimin Kyoushi wa Maou no Musume-Tachi no Katei Kyoushi to Naru~

altTitles.ja: 魔王令嬢の教育係 ～勇者学院を追放された平民教師は魔王の娘たちの家庭教師となる～

altTitles.en: The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Heroes' Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for Demons' Daughters
The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Brave Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for the Devil's Daughters

description.en:
Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first, they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human, but as he demonstrates his abilities, he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King’s daughters.
Flay’s new life as an educator, under one roof with five cute but problematic girls with varying personalities, begins!
description.ja: 次代の英雄を育てる学院̶̶通称『勇者学院』。そこで教鞭をとっていたフレイは、同僚に嵌められてクビになってしまう。そんな彼は、謎のメイドから再就職先を斡旋される。その仕事とは、５人の魔王令嬢たちの家庭教師だった！英雄を育てていた教師が、魔王の娘たちを育てていく。

description.en: "Ah-jin," who was enjoying the game using her younger brother's account, approached the female user [Flower Princess] for the sake of the guild, but ended up being identified as a lurking female. "Actually, I'm a woman...!" Meanwhile, 'Ji-hyeon,' who is secretly active as [Flower Princess], feels that the voice in the video sent by Ah-jin sounds familiar...

altTitles.ja-ro: Narutaru - Mukuro Naru Hoshi Tama Taru Ko

altTitles.en: Shadow Star
The Star That Died And the Jewel Of A Girl

altTitles.ja: なるたる
なるたる ～骸なる星・珠たる子～
星星公主

description.en:
The story could basically be split into two halves. The main story is about Tamai Shiina, who is an energetic middle-school teenage girl. She visits her grandparent's over the summer where she runs into a very strange creature. Shiina has had lots of strange dreams as of late and also when she was younger, and this strange creature is somewhat related to her visions. She names the small cuddly star-shaped creature, Hoshimaru.  
  
Little did she know that this cuddly creature is really part of herself. After her vacation, Shiina goes back to her home, living with her father. She runs into other children with similar creatures the following days. However, these children have developed their creatures, and they have complete control over them. They mostly use these creatures for their own destructive pleasure and not for good. There is a group of teenagers that all have these strange creatures, and they plan to basically conquer the world, creating a utopia of whatever they desire. Will they succeed? Will Shiina ever develop Hoshimaru?

title.en: Isekai de Café wo Kaiten Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 異世界でカフェを開店しました。

altTitles.en: Opening a Café in Another World

altTitles.zh: 在异世界开咖啡厅了哟

altTitles.zh-hk: 在異世界開咖啡廳了哟

altTitles.fa: ایسکی د کافه ای کیتن شیماشیتا.

altTitles.th: เปิดร้านคาเฟ่ที่ต่างโลก

description.en: Kurokawa Lisa is an ordinary office worker, who has practiced lots of cooking while living alone. One day, she wakes up in another world, with a concerned little spirit hovering over her! She has apparently been transported to a magical, spirit-filled realm by the will of the goddess, and there is no known way for her to go back. She is taken in by a wealthy couple, and they and her new spirit helper treat her with nothing but kindness. There is one problem, however–the food in this magical world is gross! Lisa insists on helping the household cooking staff prepare a traditional meal from her world, and it is a big hit with her hosts. Soon Lisa knows what she should do in this new world; she should open a café and treat everyone to delicious food!
description.ja: 突然、ごはんのマズ～い異世界にトリップしてしまった理沙。もう耐えられない！　と食文化を発展させるべく、カフェを開店。噂はたちまち広まり、カフェは大評判に。精霊のバジルちゃんや素敵な人達に囲まれて異世界ライフを満喫します！

title.en: On My Way To See My Mom

altTitles.en: On the Way to Meet Mom

description.en:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.
description.ko: 폐가에서 발견된 아이 '모리'는 구조대에 의해 보호소에서 눈을 뜬다. 익숙하지 않은 생활에 적응하던 어느 날 후원자에게 조건 없는 사랑을 받고 자라는데.. 친하게 지내던 친구가 엄마와 떠나고, 엄마라는 존재가 있다는 걸 알게 된 아이는 생각한다. 혹시 이 사람이.. 나의 엄마가 아닐까? 모리의 멀고도 험한 엄마 만나러 가는 이야기.

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).
description.ja:
狐を拾ったら、嫁がれました。

三十路手前のサラリーマン、日野峰吾郎は、とある理由で嫁ぎ遅れた化け狐、こがねを助けたことで恩返しと称した求婚を迫られる。こがねを無下にすることもできず、吾郎は「1年間の同棲を経て妻として認められたら結婚する」という条件を提案することに。果たしてこがねは無事に嫁ぐことができるのか？

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !
description.ja: 樹木暦1294年。音が“見える”ラッパ手の少年・リュカは傭兵団に属しながらも戦争を嫌い、楽師になる事を夢見ていた。しかしある日、「枝憑き」と呼ばれる力が発現し、彼の運命は大きく動き出す――。

description.en:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.en: New Goguryeo Chronicles
Record of a New Goguryeo

description.en: New Chronicles of Goguryeo In a world unfolding within my dreams, It was the late Goguryeo period, And I became Yeon Namsaeng, son of Yeon Gaesomun. In reality, I am Kim Namsaeng…

altTitles.ja: 学園アイドルマスター GOLD RUSH

altTitles.en: Academy Idolmaster: Gold Rush

description.en: The story of girls who attend a school where dreams come true!

altTitles.ja: 限界独身女子(26)ごはん

altTitles.vi: Bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị (26) độc thân

altTitles.es-la: Comidas de despedida de soltera de 26 años
El sufrimiento de una Doomer no amada de 26 años

altTitles.en: The Meals Of A Single Woman (26) At Her Limit
The Meals Of a 26 Year Old Single At Her Limit
26 Year Old Bachelorette's Meals
The Suffering of a 26 Year Old Unloved Female Doomer

altTitles.pt-br: O Sofrimento de uma Doomer de 26 Anos Não Amada
Refeições de uma mulher solteira no limite (26 anos)

description.en: Hiiragi-san is a single woman who is exhausted from work and life. No matter how depressed she is, she always ends up hungry.
description.ja:
鬱、孤独、たまに飯。
仕事につかれ、生活につかれた限界独身女子の柊さん。どんなに憂鬱でも、おなかだけは空いてしまうようです。
description.vi: Cuộc sống hằng ngày cùng những bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị độc thân thất nghiệp chán đời.
description.es-la: La Sr. Hiiragi, es una chica marginalmente soltera que está cansada del trabajo y la vida. No importa cuán deprimido esté, mi estómago parece estar vacío.
description.pt-br: Hiiragi-san é uma mulher solteira, exausta do trabalho e da vida. Não importa o quão deprimida ela esteja, ela sempre acaba ficando com fome.

title.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.ja: “クソゲー”をこよなく愛する男・陽務楽郎。彼が次に挑んだのは、総プレイヤー数3000万人の“神ゲー”『シャングリラ・フロンティア』だった!　集う仲間、広がる世界。そして“宿敵”との出会いが、彼の、全てのプレイヤーの運命を変えていく!!
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou wa Slow Life wo Enjoy Shitai! ~Yatto Konyaku Hakisareta no ni, Daini Ouji ga Meccha Stalker Shitekurun desu kedo~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢はスローライフをエンジョイしたい！～やっと婚約破棄されたのに、第二王子がめっちゃストーカーしてくるんですけど…～

altTitles.vi: Nữ Phản Diện Muốn Tận Hưởng Cuộc Sống Nhàn Nhã! - Vừa Bị Huỷ Hôn, Nhưng Thái Tử Thứ Hai Lại Liên Tục Đeo Bám Tôi

description.en:
"I break off my engagement to you!"

The crown prince threw this line at Sylvie at the school's graduation ceremony, and the villainous daughter Sylvie smiled with satisfaction. With a smile on her face, she says, "Yes! I will gladly accept! I will gladly accept!" She was accused of bullying the Dauphin's girlfriend, but she debunked the allegation with a brilliant alibi: "I was digging radishes in the dungeon." With the fee she had collected and her S-class adventurer's license in hand, Sylvie moved comfortably to a farm.

She is ready to start living the slow life she has dreamed of for so long! But then, the second prince, the brother of her former fiancé, arrives on the scene! It seems that he sees Sylvie as a dangerous person who is avenging the royal family, and he often stays in the house to watch over her...
description.ja:
「やっと来たのね、婚約破棄（待望）の瞬間が…」
「そなたとの婚約は破棄する!」

学園の卒業式で王太子からお約束の台詞を投げつけられた悪役令嬢シルヴィ。彼女は会心の笑みで……「はい! 喜んでお受けします!」と答えた。王太子の恋人へのいじめ疑惑をかけられるも、「ダンジョンで大根を掘っていた」という華麗なアリバイで論破。ふんだくった慰謝料とS級冒険者のライセンスを片手に、シルヴィはとある農場へ悠々と移住する。

かねてからの夢だったスローライフを始めよう! と思いきや、かつての婚約者の弟である第二王子が押し掛けてきた!? どうやらシルヴィを王家に仇なす危険人物として見ているらしく、監視と称してたびたび居座るようになり!?
description.vi: Khoảnh khắc chờ đợi từ lâu để chấm dứt hôn ước cuối cùng đã đến..." "Ta tuyên bố  hủy bỏ hôn ước với cô!" Tại lễ tốt nghiệp của học viện, Silvia, nữ phản diện, được thái tử tuyên bố hủy bỏ hôn ước. Cô trả lời với một nụ cười chân thành... "Tôi xin trân trọng nhận lời" Cô bị buộc tội bắt nạt bạn gái của thái tử, nhưng cô bác bỏ với một chứng cứ tuyệt vời rằng cô đang "đào củ cải trong dungeon." Với phần thưởng hậu hĩnh và giấy phép mạo hiểm giá cấp S, Silvia chuyển đến một trang trại. Khi cô đang nghĩ đến việc bắt đầu cuộc sống chậm rãi mà cô luôn mơ ước, em trai của vị hôn phu cũ, thái tử thứ hai, đã đến! Dường như anh ta coi Silvie là một người nguy hiểm đối với hoàng gia và thường xuyên ở đó dưới danh nghĩa giám sát cô!

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
description.fr: La vie remplit d'infortune et d'épreuve de Cheo Yeo-Woon, bâtard et dernier dans l'ordre de succession, prit un tournant après qu'un de ses « descendant » venant du futur ait injecté des Nano Machines dans son corps.
description.id:
Setelah mengalami cobaan berat pada hidupnya, Tiba tiba Chun yeowun mendapatkan pertolongan tidak terduga dari keturunannya di masa depan yang memasukkan teknologi nano ke dalam tubuhnya! Mampukah Chun Yeowun menjadi master bela diri dengan menggunakan kekuatan nano mashin!?

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
description.ja:
「未来の力を手に入れ、邪悪な魔教に立ち向かう！」 魔教の私生児として生まれた主人公・天黎雲。 幼い頃から卑しまれ、後継者争いで命を狙われる。 死に物狂いの抵抗もむなしく、危うく命を落としかねない絶体絶命のピンチに･･･！ その瞬間、突如現れた謎の男から「ナノマシン」と呼ばれる未来の力を注入され、 目覚めるととてつもない力を手に入れていた。 魔教を超え、最強の武人を目指す天黎雲の物語が幕を開ける！

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
description.ko:
갖은 멸시와 목숨의 위협을 받던 마교의 사생아 천여운, 
미래에서 나타난 후손이 천여운의 몸에 나노 머신을 주입한 후 그의 인생이 송두리째 바뀐다.
마교를 넘어 무림 최고의 자리에 오르기 위한 천여운의 거침없는 이야기가 시작된다!

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.
description.th:
เรื่องราวของชอนยออุนลูกนอกสมรสภายในพรรคมารที่ได้เป็นเทวบุตรมารรุ่นที่ 2 และอยู่เหนือประมุขพรรคมาร

description.zh:
无名小卒却有了神秘机器，
或许我也能挑战一下魔神？
魔教私生子天如运饱受蔑视和生命威胁，某天来自未来的后人突然出现，给天如运的身体注入了纳米机器，从此他的人生发生了翻天覆地的变化。

---

description.pt-br: Depois de ser desdenhado e ter sua vida em perigo, Cheon Yeo-Woon, um órfão do culto demoníaco, recebeu uma visita inesperada de seu descendente do futuro, que inseriu nele uma micro máquina, que mudou drasticamente a vida de Cheon Yeo-Woon após sua ativação. A história da jornada de Cheon Yeo-Woon no culto demoníaco e sua subida para se tornar o melhor nas artes marciais acabou de começar.
description.zh-hk:
在魔教少教主候選人中排名最後的天如運，是個運氣極差的人。 某天，來自未來的後代突然穿越時空出現，並且將奈米機器注入他的身體，徹底翻轉了他的人生。

altTitles.en: My Inventory Is Abnormal

description.en: Yuujun Shin, a wealthy crypto investor, spends his time mastering a little-known game and purchasing all the best perks to dominate. When the game unexpectedly merges with reality, Yuujun finds himself in the game world with access to his massive virtual inventory. Now, with his amassed power and resources, he is more than ready to navigate this new reality...or is he?

altTitles.en: 7O3X Fastest Finger First

altTitles.th: เกมตอบโจทย์พิชิตฝัน

altTitles.ja: ナナマル サンバツ
ナナマルサンバツ～7○3×～

altTitles.en: 7O3X

description.en:
As soon as he entered high school, Shiki Koshiyama was invited to the mysterious "Quiz Study Group" led by his senpai. What will Shiki run into when being dragged along by his classmate Mari into the dazzling world of competitive quizzes?! 

Get ready for a manga that features fierce quiz competitions!
description.ja:
入学早々、高校１年生の越山識が勧誘されたのは、怪しげな先輩が会長を務める「クイズ研究会」だった！　同級生の真理に引っ張られ、識が出会った競技クイズのめくるめく世界とは！？　

熱血競技クイズ漫画登場！

title.en: Harem Yori Heion o! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure

altTitles.ja: ハーレムより平穏を！異世界で静かにニート姫させてくれ

altTitles.ja-ro: Harem Yori Heion wo! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure

altTitles.en: More Peace than a Harem: In Another World, Let Me Be a Neet Princess in Peace
I Wish for Peace Instead of a Harem! Let Me Be a NEET Princess Peacefully in Another World

altTitles.es-la: Más paz que un harem - En otro mundo, déjame ser una princesa Nini en paz
En otro mundo, déjame ser una princesa NiNi en paz

description.en:
An elite salaryman (aspiring NEET), gets reincarnated and genderswapped into a princess living an idle life of masturbation...!?

Kishibe is an elite office worker who dreams of becoming a NEET who has attained FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early). The fulfillment of his dream is now right before his very eyes!! ...or was, when he died saving a girl from getting hit by a car. A self-proclaimed god felt pity for such a man, so she reincarnated Kishibe into another world where he could live as a NEET. The next thing he knew, he had become Iris, the princess of a superpower kingdom!!

Blessed with incredible beauty and not having the need to work even once, Kishibe won the jackpot with a life full of indolence, freedom and masturbation!! ...is what he believed, but there was a catch. Princess Iris seemed like she possessed a trait that made others love her at the highest level (a skill?), and various girls just keep coming on to her (who was formerly a man)...!?

This is another world where one can experience endless love and eat meals that one didn't work for (does it taste good?), it's an envy-inducing, genderswap isekai story with a super NEET harem!

(Source: Nico Nico Seiga)
description.ja:
エリートサラリーマン、姫様にTS転生してオナ●ート生活…!!!?

ニートを夢見てFIREをした、エリートサラリーマン・岸辺。夢の生活も目前!! のはずが、車にひかれる寸前だった女の子を助けたことで死亡してしまう。そんな彼を憐れんだ自称神様が岸辺をニートができる異世界へと転生。気づけば超大国の姫様・アイリスになっていた!!! 超絶美少女で一切働く必要がなく、惰眠と自由とオナ●ーのし放題で岸辺は人生勝ち組!! …と確信していたが、ある問題が。この姫様、最高レベルの愛され体質（スキル？）みたいで、色々な女の子が姫様（元男）に迫られまくり……!!?

異世界で愛されまくって働かないメシが上手いか？を体験できる、羨ましすぎる異世界TSクソニートハーレム!!!!

altTitles.ja: ボクを知りたすぎる清水さん

altTitles.en: Shimizu-san who wants to know me too much

description.en:
Atago Gato is a shy and reclusive high school boy. One day, while preparing for the school festival, a cute and cheerful classmate named Shimizu Roman finds out that he is aiming to become a manga artist. Isn't that amazing? The popular girl, who seems to live in a different world from him, takes an interest in him and asks him a lot of questions he never expected! When he confesses a traumatic experience after being criticized on SNS... Shimizu-san tries to help him overcome it in a slightly strange way...? A youthful romantic comedy in which a cheerful girl and a gloomy boy struggle to make manga!

(Source: AniList)
description.es: Atago Gato es un chico de instituto tímido y solitario. Un día, mientras se prepara para el festival escolar, una simpática y alegre compañera de clase llamada Shimizu Roman descubre que aspira a convertirse en dibujante de manga. ¿No es increíble? La chica popular, que parece vivir en un mundo distinto al suyo, se interesa por él y le hace un montón de preguntas que no esperaba. Cuando confiesa una experiencia traumática tras ser criticado en SNS... Shimizu-san intenta ayudarle a superarlo de una forma un tanto extraña...? ¡Una comedia romántica juvenil en la que una chica alegre y un chico sombrío luchan por hacer manga!
description.id:
Atago Gato adalah anak SMA yang pemalu dan tertutup. Suatu hari, saat mempersiapkan festival sekolah, teman sekelasnya yang lucu dan ceria bernama Shimizu Roman mengetahui bahwa dia bercita-cita menjadi seorang seniman manga. Bukankah itu luar biasa? Gadis populer, yang sepertinya hidup di dunia yang berbeda darinya, menaruh minat padanya dan menanyakan banyak pertanyaan yang tidak pernah dia duga! Saat dia mengakui pengalaman traumatis setelah dikritik di SNS... Shimizu-san mencoba membantunya mengatasinya dengan cara yang sedikit aneh...?
Sebuah komedi romantis masa muda di mana seorang gadis ceria dan seorang anak laki-laki muram berjuang untuk membuat manga!
description.ja: 陰キャで引っ込み思案の高校生・愛宕画人（あたごがくと）。ある日、文化祭の準備中に陽キャで可愛すぎる女子高生・清水ろまんに『マンガ家を目指している』ことがバレてしまう。「めっちゃスゴくない！？」住む世界が違うカノジョから興味を持たれて、まさかの質問攻め！？ SNSで批判されたトラウマを告白すると…清水さんは、ちょっぴりカゲキな方法で克服させようとしてきて――？　陽キャな女子と陰キャな男子がマンガ作りに奮闘する青春ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Atago Gato es un chico de instituto tímido y solitario. Un día, mientras se prepara para el festival escolar, una simpática y alegre compañera de clase llamada Shimizu Roman descubre que aspira a convertirse en dibujante de manga. ¿No es increíble? La chica popular, que parece vivir en un mundo distinto al suyo, se interesa por él y le hace un montón de preguntas que no esperaba. Cuando confiesa una experiencia traumática tras ser criticado en SNS... Shimizu-san intenta ayudarle a superarlo de una forma un tanto extraña...? ¡Una comedia romántica juvenil en la que una chica alegre y un chico sombrío luchan por hacer manga!

title.en: After His Insomnia Was Cured, the Tyrant Became Obsessive

altTitles.ko: 不眠症を治しただけなのに暴君に執着されてます

description.en: A young woman who works as a book-reading YouTuber falls asleep while reading and is possessed by the book she is reading. She ends up in the tyrant's bedroom. Once inside the tyrant's bedroom, she tells him what she needs to do to stay alive, and he falls asleep while listening. From then on, she becomes the tyrant's insomnia therapist. In order to escape from the tyrant, she must cure his insomnia, but as she does, the tyrant becomes obsessed with her...

altTitles.ja-ro: Hana no Keiji -Kumo no Kanata ni-

altTitles.en: Keiji

altTitles.ja: 花の慶次 -雲のかなたに-

description.en: During the closing years of the civil war period and uneasy reign of Toyotomi Hideyoshi, when men high and low scramble to follow conventional propriety so that they don't attract undue notice (or death) to themselves, there is one very bizarre individual who is known for his legendarily outlandish and wild personality, physical appearance and behavior. This series traces the dramatic adventures of Keiji Maeda from personal conflicts with his adopted Maeda family, brave combat exploits, travels to the capital, and relationships with famous existing figures such as Iyeyasu Tokugawa, Rikyuu the tea master, and Hideyoshi himself, to experiences with the foreign and Japanese Christian faithful.

title.en: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu: On to Off

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活－オンとオフ－

altTitles.en: On and Off: Work-Life Imbalance
Company and Private Life: On and Off

altTitles.es-la: Vida empresarial y privada: ON y OFF

description.en:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when they’re "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics!
___
A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.
description.ja:
働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！
働く人々には会社（オン）と私生活（オフ）がある。ある人は会社員と女装ロリィタ。ある人は会社員と男装パンク。オンとオフのギャップにキュン必至！ 働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！X（旧:Twitter）にて累計200万いいね突破の話題作が、イラストから完全コマ割りでコミックス化！
description.es-la: Estos trabajadores tienen una vida en la empresa (ON) y otra privada (OFF). El es un oficinista que se viste de Lolita. Ella es una oficinistas que se viste de punk.
